医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
饮食炎症与冠心病患者死亡风险较高有关研究人员研究了饮食炎症与冠心病之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Dietary-inflammation-linked-to-higher-mortality-risk-in-coronary-heart-disease-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Dietary-inflammation-linked-to-higher-mortality-risk-in-coronary-heart-disease-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fe4aacb-4cf2-4631-8568-acb5699aae61 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 05:38:00 -0400 Dietary inflammation linked to higher mortality risk in coronary heart disease patients
研究表明 COVID-19 疫苗与 5,000 多名患者出现暂时性面瘫有关这项研究确定了 COVID-19 疫苗与面瘫之间的潜在联系，呼吁加强对疫苗安全性的监测和了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Research-links-COVID-19-vaccines-to-temporary-facial-palsy-in-over-5000-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Research-links-COVID-19-vaccines-to-temporary-facial-palsy-in-over-5000-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860d38c0-f682-48ec-85c1-36e49d00822f Tue, 15 Oct 2024 05:04:00 -0400 Research links COVID-19 vaccines to temporary facial palsy in over 5,000 patients
研究警告加州儿童落基山斑疹热病例增加最近的儿童落基山斑疹热病例强调了 mcf-NGS 在非流行地区早期发现和及时治疗的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Study-warns-of-increasing-Rocky-Mountain-spotted-fever-cases-among-children-in-California.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Study-warns-of-increasing-Rocky-Mountain-spotted-fever-cases-among-children-in-California.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb722d6b-c608-4cfa-adbe-a754d212423d Tue, 15 Oct 2024 04:31:00 -0400 Study warns of increasing Rocky Mountain spotted fever cases among children in California
气候变化焦虑正在推动美国人采取集体气候行动新的研究表明，虽然气候焦虑促使许多美国人对气候变化采取行动，但那些患有严重困扰的人可能难以参与，这凸显了在应对环境威胁时需要心理健康支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Climate-change-anxiety-is-pushing-Americans-toward-collective-climate-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Climate-change-anxiety-is-pushing-Americans-toward-collective-climate-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b00b7401-668d-4286-94db-c8c52367b741 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 00:20:00 -0400 Climate change anxiety is pushing Americans toward collective climate action
加拿大的流产管理需要富有同情心的方法流产或早孕流产可能会造成毁灭性的情绪影响，但在加拿大管理不善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Compassionate-approaches-needed-for-miscarriage-management-in-Canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Compassionate-approaches-needed-for-miscarriage-management-in-Canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae3f404c-a2d1-4633-8b2d-2f5dd4acbdae Tue, 15 Oct 2024 00:18:03 -0400 Compassionate approaches needed for miscarriage management in Canada
营养师通过个性化护理和副作用管理提高 GLP-1 治疗的成功率研究人员揭示了个性化沟通和副作用管理对于改善使用 GLP-1 药物进行体重管理的患者的治疗结果的重要性。该研究强调了营养师在指导生活方式和饮食改变方面的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Dietitians-boost-GLP-1-therapy-success-with-personalized-care-and-side-effect-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Dietitians-boost-GLP-1-therapy-success-with-personalized-care-and-side-effect-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bba19a4-47ab-499e-a26c-d158f25ab637 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 00:03:00 -0400 Dietitians boost GLP-1 therapy success with personalized care and side effect management
研究揭示影响浪漫吸引力的伴侣特征昆士兰大学的研究发现，人们看重浪漫伴侣的特质会影响他们的约会选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Research-reveals-partner-traits-that-influence-romantic-attraction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Research-reveals-partner-traits-that-influence-romantic-attraction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=536cbb88-5473-41de-88c2-b89066dc27dd Mon, 14 Oct 2024 23:55:00 -0400
气候变化与暴力侵害妇女行为增加有关伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，受严重气候变化影响的国家暴力侵害妇女行为也可能更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Climate-change-linked-to-increased-violence-against-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Climate-change-linked-to-increased-violence-against-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60a4536d-be34-40bc-8e3a-896d89576a06 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 23:52:44 -0400 Climate change linked to increased violence against women
基因组发现揭示了古代日本人口的起源东京大学的Jonghyun Kim和Jun Ohashi领导的联合研究小组证明，弥生和古坟时期（公元前3000年至公元538年）日本列岛的移民大部分来自朝鲜半岛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Genomic-findings-shed-light-on-ancient-Japan-population-origins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Genomic-findings-shed-light-on-ancient-Japan-population-origins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e96e5fad-0cef-4bb4-87a4-4388e576c229 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 23:49:23 -0400 Genomic findings shed light on ancient Japanese population origins
报告概述了到 2050 年将过早死亡人数减少一半的路径自1970年以来，已有37个国家将其公民在70岁之前死亡的可能性降低了一半，这一里程碑标志着许多国家在预防和治疗疾病方面取得了显着进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Report-outlines-path-to-halve-premature-deaths-by-2050.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Report-outlines-path-to-halve-premature-deaths-by-2050.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=070991eb-7b37-4e9f-ae8f-8bcd3a684d0e Mon, 14 Oct 2024 23:30:00 -0400 Report outlines path to halve premature deaths by 2050
